Package se.nicklasgavelin.sphero.macro.command

Class Summary
Calibrate Calibration command as a macro command Used for setting the 0 heading
Delay Macro command for waiting a specific delay before running the next macro command, add this macro command BETWEEN two different macro commands to add a delay between them.
Emit  
EndStream  
Fade Example usage (Robot r): MacroObject mo = new MacroObject(); mo.setMode( MacroObject.MacroObjectMode.CachedStreaming ); // Send fade (500 ms fade hold for 1 second) mo.addCommand( new Fade( 255, 0, 0, 500 ) ); mo.addCommand( new Delay( 1000 ) ); // Send fade (500 ms fade hold for 1 second) mo.addCommand( new Fade( 0, 255, 0, 500 ) ); mo.addCommand( new Delay( 1000 ) ); // Send fade (500 ms fade hold for 1 second) mo.addCommand( new Fade( 0, 0, 255, 500 ) ); mo.addCommand( new Delay( 1000 ) ); r.sendCommand( mo );
FrontLED  
LoopEnd  
LoopStart  
RawMotor Raw motor macro command
RGB RGB Macro command
RGBSD2  
Roll Macro ROLL command
RollSD1  
RollSD1SPD1  
RollSD1SPD2  
RotationRate A macro command to set the rotation rate of the Sphero device
SD1  
SD2  
SPD1  
SPD2  
WaitUntilStop
